trans-unit.source: Collection of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> objects that inherits from <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Samling av <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objekter som arver fra <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordningene definerer tilordningen mellom datakilde og måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: If mappings are not defined—that is, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilordninger ikke er definert – det vil si den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen er tom, kolonnene er tilordnet implisitt basert på ordenstall posisjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this to work, source and target schemas must match.
trans-unit.target: Kilden og målet skjemaer må samsvare med dette til å fungere.

trans-unit.source: If they do not, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de ikke, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen er tom, ikke alle kolonnene i datakilden må angis.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Those not mapped by the collection are ignored.
trans-unit.target: De ikke er tilordnet til samlingen ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal.
trans-unit.target: Du kan referere til kilden og målet kolonner etter navn eller ordenstall.

trans-unit.source: You can mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan blande by-name og ved ordenstallet kolonnereferanser i samme samling tilordninger.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified mapping to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte tilordningen til den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object that describes the mapping to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet som beskriver tilordningen som skal legges til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> and adds it to the collection, using ordinals to specify both source and destination columns.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> og legger det til i samlingen, ved hjelp av ordenstall til å angi både kilde- og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs.
trans-unit.target: Tilordninger i en samling må være uniform: alle heltall/heltall-par, alle streng/streng-par, alle heltallsstreng/par eller alle streng/heltall-par.

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å legge til en tilordning som er forskjellig fra andre allerede i samlingen, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet posisjonen for kildekolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the destination column within the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet plasseringen av målkolonnen i måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: A column mapping.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordning.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> and adds it to the collection, using an ordinal for the source column and a string for the destination column.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> og legger det til i samlingen, ved hjelp av en ordenstall for kildekolonnen og en streng for målkolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs.
trans-unit.target: Tilordninger i en samling må være uniform: alle heltall/heltall-par, alle streng/streng-par, alle heltallsstreng/par eller alle streng/heltall-par.

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å legge til en tilordning som er forskjellig fra andre allerede i samlingen, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet posisjonen for kildekolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The name of the destination column within the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på målkolonnen i måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: A column mapping.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordning.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> and adds it to the collection, using a column name to describe the source column and an ordinal to specify the destination column.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> og legger det til i samlingen, ved hjelp av et kolonnenavn kildekolonnen og ingen ordenstall til å angi målkolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs.
trans-unit.target: Tilordninger i en samling må være uniform: alle heltall/heltall-par, alle streng/streng-par, alle heltallsstreng/par eller alle streng/heltall-par.

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å legge til en tilordning som er forskjellig fra andre allerede i samlingen, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the destination column within the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet plasseringen av målkolonnen i måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: A column mapping.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordning.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> and adds it to the collection, using column names to specify both source and destination columns.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> og legger det til i samlingen, ved hjelp av kolonnenavn for å angi både kilde- og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs.
trans-unit.target: Tilordninger i en samling må være uniform: alle heltall/heltall-par, alle streng/streng-par, alle heltallsstreng/par eller alle streng/heltall-par.

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å legge til en tilordning som er forskjellig fra andre allerede i samlingen, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the source column within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kildekolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The name of the destination column within the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på målkolonnen i måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: A column mapping.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordning.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner innholdet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method is most commonly used when you use a single <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance to process more than one bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Fjern metoden brukes vanligvis når du bruker en enkelt <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten ikke behandle flere massekopieringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must clear the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection> after the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method and before processing the next bulk copy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter kolonnetilordningene for en massekopieringsoperasjon, må du fjerne de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection>når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>metoden og før behandling av den neste massekopiering.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Performing several bulk copies using the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> for each operation.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere bulk Kopier bruker samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten, blir vanligvis mer effektiv fra en ytelse punkt enn å bruke en separat <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>for hver operasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et angitt <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified mapping exists in the collection; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte tilordningen til finnes i samlingen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"></xref> to an array of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> items, starting at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: Overfører av elementene i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"> </xref> til en matrise av <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> elementer, med Start fra en bestemt indeks.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> array that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den endimensjonal <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> matrise som er målet for elementene kopieres fra <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen i `array` som kopiering begynner.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den angitte <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet det skal søkes etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column mapping, or -1 if the column mapping is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for kolonnetilordningen eller -1 Hvis kolonnetilordningen ikke finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Insert a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> at the index specified.
trans-unit.target: Sett inn en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> på den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Integer value of the location within the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"></xref> at which to insert the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdien for plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"> </xref> som skal settes inn det nye <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object to be inserted in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref>objektet som settes inn i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> til å finne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> element from the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> elementet fra den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method is most commonly used when you use a single <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance to process more than one bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Remove-metoden brukes vanligvis når du bruker en enkelt <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten ikke behandle flere massekopieringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter kolonnetilordningene for en massekopieringsoperasjon, må du fjerne tilordninger som gjelder ikke lenger etter den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>metoden er kall og før du definerer tilordning for neste massekopiering.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can clear the entire collection by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A> method, or remove mappings individually using the Remove method or the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fjerne hele samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A>metode, eller Fjern tilordninger ark med Remove-metoden eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performing several bulk copies using the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> for each operation.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere bulk Kopier bruker samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten, blir vanligvis mer effektiv fra en ytelse punkt enn å bruke en separat <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>for hver operasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object to be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref>objektet som skal fjernes fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the mapping at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner tilordningen i den angitte indeksen fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAt method is most commonly used when you use a single <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance to process more than one bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAt brukes vanligvis når du bruker en enkelt <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten ikke behandle flere massekopieringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter kolonnetilordningene for en massekopieringsoperasjon, må du fjerne tilordninger som gjelder ikke lenger etter den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>metoden er kall og før du definerer tilordning for neste massekopiering.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can clear the entire collection by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A> method, or remove mappings individually using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Remove%2A> method or the RemoveAt method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fjerne hele samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A>metode, eller Fjern tilordninger ark med den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Remove%2A>metoden eller metoden RemoveAt.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performing several bulk copies using the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> for each operation.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere bulk Kopier bruker samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten, blir vanligvis mer effektiv fra en ytelse punkt enn å bruke en separat <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>for hver operasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> object to be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> objektet som skal fjernes fra samlingen.
